. China can help ease imbalances by raising the value of its currency, Olivier Blanchard said. The U.S. and other countries charge that China keeps its currency artificially low to maintain an export advantage. China is moving in the right direction and focusing increasingly on domestic demand, but we think it can be done faster, he said. A story published Saturday said Mitch Daniels would be the odds-on favorite for the GOP nomination in 2012 if pundits, conservative columnists and political thinkers represented the party's base. The diminutive Hoosier has nurtured a profile as a mature politician whose outlook extends beyond the next news cycle and whose demeanor exudes seriousness, the story said.
